drug_names: VEMURAFENIB, CHEMBL:CHEMBL602150, CHEMBL:CHEMBL201325, CHK1 INHIBITOR GDC-0575, FENTICLOR
rationale: When BRAF is mutated, cancer cells become dependent on TP53. Targeting TP53 with VEMURAFENIB could selectively kill tumor cells.
